oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Vogelgrippe, und nun?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Artmann, Martina
Burkart, Stefan
Helmle, Simone
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The bird-flu-expansion to Europe and the following tabloid reporting spark again the fear to fall sick or to die and make people think over their eating habits. Are such scandals maybe a chance for an upswing of organic farming? Generally consumers have high confidence in ecological and regional production methods, animal diseases stabilize preferences for ecological products and remind people to swish to such products.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Artmann, Martina; Burkart, Stefan and Helmle, Simone (2007) Vogelgrippe, und nun? [Bird flu, well then?] Poster at: Zwischen Tradition und Globalisierung - 9. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Universität Hohenheim, Stuttgart, Deutschland, 20-23 March 2007.
